thread.section_title: Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect
thread.title_full: Perfect - Review of Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: crisgrif
title: Perfect
text: My daughter brought me to Paris for my first visit the hotel was perfect lovely room helpful staff and perfect location I had an amazing time even though the weather could have been better ....would stay at this lovely hotel again loved the novelty lifts and the amazing sight as I stepped out of the hotel my first night ....the Eiffel Tower lit up and twinkling....magical
